question: Nilkanth Khadilkar, who recently died in Mumbai was a famous personality of which field?
explanation: Nilkanth KhadilkarÂ  was the editor of Marathi newspaper Navakal.He died at a private hospital in suburban Bandra. He was the editor of the newspaper for 27 years and had gained popularity for his hard-hitting editorials which became the daily\'s popular feature. Nilkanth Khadilkar was also author of a few books, including \"Practical Socialism: musings from a tour of Russia\".
